What's in there for
DESIGNERS

• Plethora of preset styles and images
  • Use latest HTML5 tech without having to worry about Browser compatibility
  • Work on real sites in real time. Share, gather feedback and improve on the live
  • Multiple layout options with elegant typography and textures

What's in there for
BUSINESSES

• Get out-of-the-box website
  • Your business drive your content. Edit it yourself and keep your site up-to-date
  • No maintenance required

No Coding Needed
Focus on Content and Design

Everything else from hosting, domain,
maintenance, etc are taken care by us
DesignOnCloud is the easiest and most advanced tool to go online immediately. It allows immense flexibility in terms of customization and help remove the complex process of creating a prototype.
Shayak Sen, Former Creative Director, Cheesecare
"
Features and Technology
Easy To Use

Simplicity is beauty, but we can also deal with complexity if need be. We make it possible for everyone to design their own business website with ease. We have the best astounding features and the latest themes to suite your need.
Go Social
Promote and advertise your website on Facebook and Twitter using our cool widgets. Our weekly newsletter will guide you how to make it through the market through social networking.
Mobile Friendly
Since the mobile industry is much larger than the internet market, nowadays, we will customize your website to fit into your mobile media phone.
Business Focused
We understand your business. We make your business our business. Our widgets are custom-fitted to meet your business demands, and are all designed to generate more sales leads.
Increase Traffic

We know what a profitable website is.  We will actively promote your business online in order to increase traffic. More traffic means more sales and more site visitors means that you have more conversion rates as well.
Cloud Hosting

Whether you are running your website straight from the comforts of your home, or right from your office, we can surely deliver. If you have a huge workforce, our website platform can handle them for you.
About Us

We at DesignOnCloud are a small start-up team with a big dream. We have worked with the internet and its technologies for a number of years now.
We have a wide experience in developing various management and technical roles, creating online identities, and setting strategy for Fortune 500 companies around the world.
DesignOnCloud Vision

DesignOnCloud sees the true value of a website. We believe that your site is your identity. We have built a simple and easy-to-use platform that business owners can use for their websites. Now you can easily create your own customized sites and put your identity in it. DesignOnCloud is also taking another step forward through the use of the social media. Now you can fully utilize our social media tools to spread the word out. Interaction with your clients has never been this easy and efficient.
DesignOnCloud Solution

Our vision is to see the widespread growth of technology and the internet, particularly in the small and medium businesses from all around the world. We want to provide a solution for businesses to expand their traditional shop online minus all the technical and logistical hassles of managing an online site. DesignOnCloud is the first step to achieving your dream of expanding online. We make it our business to do yours.

Are You A Web Designer?
If you are a web designer or an aspiring web designer and want to run an online business building websites, we are looking for you!
Contact us now for interesting partnership opportunities.
Contact Us
Features
Cloud Hosting

Zero management hassle.  Now you don't need to look up that FTP password or call up the developer that hosted your website if it goes down.  Its all on the cloud and managed by an experienced operations team.
Intuitive Editing

Edit your site anytime from anywhere.  That text or image change that needed you to edit the code, or navigate through a bulky CMS, was never this easy.  You just click and change the element on the site and it just works.
Designing Made Social

It will change the way you think about websites. A large library of pre-built styles, themes and images allow you get started quickly. At the same time, you can edit or create styles and share it for using in your other projects or share it with the world in a way that was never possible before.
Large Styles Library

Get going quickly with a large set of quick styles and icons. And then you can design new effects and share them with your friends or use across your own projects. Your favorite gradient or box shadow is now just a click away.

Who is using DesignOnCloud?
Website Designers for Portfolio Websites

For a website designer, DesignOnCloud platform is the ultimate developer companion. Designers just apply their creative skills and a semantic HTML code automatically gets generated and hosted out of the box. For a freelance designer, or a design firm, it is the ultimate feature set.
Professionals for Online Websites

For professionals, having the perfect brand conveyed on their websites becomes paramount. Our easy to use design tools give endless opportunities to customize the website exactly the way you want it to look like.
Business Owners for Online Business Website

No hosting hassle and a simple to use editing functionality means that business owners can manage their online identifty and website content easily. This is important to drive the maximum traffic and achieve the maximum impact on your website.
Online Marketers for Landing Page Design

Marketing landing pages need to be highly optimized for conversions as that directly impacts bottom line. Our easy to use cloud hosted interfaces mean you can do your tests and iterations that much faster.

Privacy Policy

DesignOnCloud is committed and dedicated in ensuring the privacy and security of its clients and their corresponding websites. Here in DesignOnCloud, we make it our top priority to seek out the best for our users. We make this all possible by providing clear expectations, accountability to our customers, consistent communication, and quality support. Through DesignOnCloud's innovative features, both DesignOnCloud and you, our valuable clients, will be on the way to achieving our business goals. Thus, this privacy statement aims to inform you about the details of our policies regarding the use and disclosure of any personal information we will get from you based upon your use of DesignOnCloud?s platform and other services.
Personal Information

Your personal information such as your name, address, email address, phone numbers, and other private information will be kept confidential. We will take heightened measures in giving attention to how your personal information is used and shared as we do business together.
User Consent

By using DesignOnCloud's products or services, you therefore agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy.  You also hereby consent us to process your personal information according to this privacy policy. Since we are in the internet business, personal information can be processed by us and our highly-trusted vendors, or other third parties in other countries around the world.
Gathering Information

It is important to know that the personal information we will gather from you will greatly help us in doing and running the business together. We will use the information we got from you to better assist us in providing you with the best service and support that DesignOnCloud can give to its clients. All the information that we will have about you will only be based upon the information that you will submit to us.

When you will use our DIY platform, certain passive information might also be gathered, including even your internet protocol address, browser type, and operating system's all vital information for us to do business together.  DesignOnCloud will also use cookies and other navigational data such as URLs to gather information regarding about the time and date of your visit and the certain actions that you will do
Information Dissemination

DesignOnCloud will also use your personal information to drive traffic to your own website. We will also utilize search engines to boost your ranking. This means that we might also disclose some keywords about your business, or your business name and other necessary details. We will also safely use third parties to process and store some of your personal information any payment that you will make to us. Fortunately, these third parties that we might use will not be required to use your personal information other than the information that you will give to us.

To improve our business, we will work together with affiliates that will help us promote DesignOnCloud. We might share some of your personal information with these affiliates with great care, adhering to this privacy policy. We may also disclose your personal information if we have a good ground to do such. This might deal with issues of compliance to relevant laws or in situations that might require us to uphold and protect the identity of DesignOnCloud. But rest assured, we make our mission to see what is best for you and your business.
Cookies

Like most sites, DesignOnCloud might store information from the user's internet browser in a form called cookies. These are data collected upon accessing the site. It is good to know that DesignOnCloud will monitor usage by sessions and may terminate some information processed once the browser is closed. We therefore highly recommend that users will log off or sign out their accounts officially upon leaving their web site.
Using Information

The personal information that you will submit to us will be used entirely for business. They will be used to set up solutions, purchase website and other marketing services, respond to requests, and to process other important transactions. DesignOnCloud might share some of your personal information with other businesses online in order to offer you products, services, and promotions. We might even share your personal information with other businesses that might want to do business with you. Our newsletter will also need your personal information for sending. Other promotional advertisements and other update will also use your information.
Communications

New users to the DesignOnCloud platform will receive a communication from us in their email. Users may need to confirm their email for account to be activated. Necessary communications such as updates and notifications will be sent to our users. We may sometimes need to contact and communicate with you through email, a personal message, or a call. It is highly advised that you constantly monitor your account and website.
Links

Being a part of an ocean of opportunities in the internet marketplace, DesignOnCloud might contain some links to other websites. Unfortunately, our privacy policy is only limited within the walls of the website. If you wish to access other linked websites, please make it sure to read their own privacy policies as well.
Security

DesignOnCloud greatly values its customers. We use the latest data encryption technology in all our transactions. Personal information is protected by industry-standard protocols and our servers are stored in a highly secured and monitored area. If you wish to know more about our security measures, you may contact us.
Notices of Service Changes

DesignOnCloud fully owns the right to change any of the policies stated above. But along with it comes our desire to see to it that you, our customers are served well. If need be, we will drop by and send out notices to all.
Contact Us
If you have any further questions and queries, please let us know. Our customer service representatives are readily available to attend to your need. You may contact us here.
Terms of Service

Welcome to DesignOnCloud! By accessing our site, you hereby agree to be bounded by the terms and conditions that we have set for DesignOnCloud and its users. If you wish to disagree to any of our terms, please do not use DesignOnCloud for any of your purposes. DesignOnCloud may update its terms, platform, and services on a regular basis but rest assured that our clients will know it first. Therefore your use of DesignOnCloud?s services following any such change constitutes your agreement to follow and be bound by it. If any change is unacceptable to you, your only recourse is to terminate your use of the site. Please contact us immediately so that we can assist you.
Copyright and Trademark Terms

DesignOnCloud and all its contents are protected by international copyright laws and are the property of DesignOnCloud and its third-party licensors. All of DesignOnCloud?s logos, texts, videos, splash screens, page headers, custom graphics, and other features used on our site must not be used by anyone except for DesignOnCloud and its official partners. DesignOnCloud and all its contents are intended solely intended for our clients and their businesses. You may use the contents displayed on our site for purposes of research, provided that you have read terms and policies, and therefore abide by it.
Disclaimer

DesignOnCloud and all its site contents are provided without representations or warranties of any kind. DesignOnCloud will not be liable to any damages or injuries resulting from your usage of this site. Everything in DesignOnCloud is provided to you as it is, without warranty of any kind. DesignOnCloud expressly disclaims all such representations and warranties, either express or implied, including, without limitation, warranties of title, merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement and any implied warranties arising from course of dealing or course of performance. Hashed also does not warrant that this site or its contents will be complete, accurate, uninterrupted, secure, or error free or that the site or the server that makes it available are free of viruses or other harmful components. All information on the site is subject to change without full notice.
Privacy

DesignOnCloud respects the privacy of individuals who will use or visit our site. You may view our privacy policy to learn more about it. By accepting our terms, you hereby consent us to use all your personal information for the greater good, with respect to DesignOnCloud?s protocols.
Linked Sites

DesignOnCloud might contain some links to other websites. Unfortunately, our privacy policy is only limited within the walls of the website. If you wish to access other linked websites, please make it sure to read their own privacy policies as well.
Feedback and Comments

You may leave your comments and feedback at our contact us page. We highly appreciate whatever comments, remarks, feedback, suggestions, ideas, and other submissions you will give us. You feedback will gladly help us to improve our services and products even more so that we can serve you better.

page.name: Tutorial
page.title: Create your First Business Website in 5 Simple Steps

data-text.text: Create your First Business Website in 5 Simple Steps
Yes. Its that simple. So grab a cup of coffee (or tea) and lets get started.
Before we start, sign up on http://designoncloud.com/register or login if you are already registered and open edit interface in a separate browser tab.
Organize homepage into rows and columns. A simple layout is 2 columns for first row and 3 columns for second row.
Step 2 - Homepage Content

Insert a "Text & Heading" widget into one of the top columns. Change the Text Heading to say something short, personal and authentic about your business. Take a look at your industry websites to get inspired.  For the text part, you can use your existing business material, brochure, an email or a presentation that describes your business.
Step 3 - Products and Services

Use the second row to detail out a few of your services or products. This can be a product image with a heading and some text description. If you have a product image catalog, upload and use one of the high quality images. If not, you can use your phone to click an image. Otherwise, use a generic image.

If you already have a logo, simply scan, upload and use it. If not use a generic logo. You can also create a fancy logo online (e.g. http://cooltext.com). For the text section, write down your company/business name in big bold font. Your business address and contact number would go on the right hand side.

Use the Pages tab to navigate to Contact Us page and update the address there. On About Us page, write a bit about your business, employees and team. You can start in chronological order (date of founding) and work from there to describe your business goals etc.

That's It. Your first website is ready for launch. Click on the Launch button (on dashboard) and complete the launch process. Share it with your friends on Facebook or with us at http://facebook.com/hashedin. We would love to go through it and provide feedback.
Bonus Step

This is optional, but you can style your site using the Themes Tab. It provides fantastic combinations of Colors, Fonts, Navigation Styles etc. Use them to achieve a desired look and feel. If you have artistic taste, you can try styling individual text and widget elements using the Design Tab to select a Quick Style or even custom backgrounds, borders, fonts etc.

data-text.text: Don't yet have an account? Register Now
A.  Create Website-level Design

First thing that you may want to do is create website-level design (like page background, header, navigation/menu, typography, etc.).  This is required in order for consistent default styling on all pages.  For this you need to do the followings:

1.  Select Color Theme:  You can select color theme from "Color" in "Themes" tab in top edit-bar.  This is required for a consistent color styling on all pages.
2.  Select Typography Theme:  In order for a consistent typography (text styling), select one from "Typography" in "Themes" tab.
3.  Select Navigation Theme:  Choose a navigation/menu from "Navigation" in "Themes" tab.
4.  Select Form & Button Theme (Optional):  You can choose styling for forms and buttons in your website from "Form" & "Button" in "Themes" tab.
5.  Background Images:  You can select/add background images for page/header from "Image" in "Background" in "Styles" tab.  Learn More
    T I P :  You can also add a different background image for your homepage than rest of the pages in your website.
6.  Website Logo and Name:  Add a logo and name to your website in the header. To add logo, click on "My Logo" image and change image by selecting
     "Browse Images" option in "Image Properties" shown in "Styles" tab.  This will open a panel from where you can select a logo or add your logo by clicking
     "+ Create New" option shown on right side of panel.  You can choose to upload image or provide a link of the logo.

Add more Pages & Products :  A page about a product or a service goes a long way to make sure that you are found on http://google.com when people are searching for that content. More people reaching your website means better opportunities to get business through leads.

The best things are the simplest things. DesignOnCloud is as easy as dragging and dropping objects in a platform with a touch of fun and excitement. In fact, it's as easy as creating a blog. Just click to customize and edit to fit your taste. Absolutely no technical expertise required! Anyone can use DesignOnCloud. You might as well try it yourself.
Widgets
Increase Traffic
Already Interested?

1.  Design Page Layout:  You can design the layout for your page by choosing number of columns in the row.  If your page has rows with different number of
     columns, you can add more rows by clicking on "Add Row" button on right side at the bottom of the page (just before site footer).  Now, you can choose
     number of columns for each of these rows as per you page layout.
2.  Style Sections:  You can style sections (say, a row or a column or content/widget, etc.) by selecting the required section from "Currently Selected" selection
     box on left side of "Styles" tab in edit-bar.  Once selected, you can style the section by using various options provided in "Styles" tab.
3.  Add Contents:  You can add contents to your page using simple drag-and-drop of the required content/widget from "Widgets" tab in top edit-bar.

T I P :  You can add a page by clicking on "+ Add Page" option in "Pages" tab of edit-bar.  This will create a form to add page on right side of "Pages" tab.   Fill the form and press "Add Page" button to create a new page.

Features Preview
This is just sample text. Click to edit it and replace with the some meaningful content about you, your profession, your business or just about anything.

1.  Select Color Theme:  You can select color theme from "Color" in "Themes" tab in top edit-bar.  This is required for a consistent color styling on all pages.
2.  Select Typography Theme:  In order for a consistent typography (text styling), select one from "Typography" in "Themes" tab.
3.  Select Navigation Theme:  Choose a navigation/menu from "Navigation" in "Themes" tab.
4.  Select Form & Button Theme (Optional):  You can choose styling for forms and buttons in your website from "Form" & "Button" in "Themes" tab.
5.  Background Images:  You can select/add background images for page/header from "Image" in "Background" in "Styles" tab.
    T I P :  You can also add a different background image for your homepage than rest of the pages in your website.
6.  Website Logo and Name:  Add a logo and name to your website in the header. To add logo, click on "My Logo" image and change image by selecting
     "Browse Images" option in "Image Properties" shown in "Styles" tab.  This will open a panel from where you can select a logo or add your logo by clicking
     "+ Create New" option shown on right side of panel.  You can choose to upload image or provide a link of the logo.
